warezcdn.name: RErideD: Tokigoe no Derrida
warezcdn.title: RErideD - Derrida, who leaps through time

imdb.title: RErideD - Derrida, who leaps through time
imdb.plot: When Derrida wakes up from a 10-year cold sleep, he'll fight to survive a devastated world to keep a promise to his friend.

episodes.title: The Place He Awakened
episodes.plot: In the year 2050, engineer Derrida Yvain becomes aware of a bug in a new line of androids developed by his company. His attempts to avert disaster are blocked at every turn, and soon, he and his friend Nathan are forced to run for their lives!

episodes.title: Who is Left in the World
episodes.plot: Derrida awakens from cryostasis ten years in the future, to find a world in ruins filled with rampaging androids. After being saved by a man named Vidaux, Derrida decides to fulfill his promise to Nathan by finding and protecting his daughter, Mage.

episodes.title: Those Who've Come Together
episodes.plot: Derrida stops by Nathan's old house, where he runs into Mage's best friend Yuri, who is now a young woman. Yuri devastates Derrida by informing him that Mage is dead, but his grief is cut short when they're attacked by a woman in black.

episodes.title: The Time Leaper
episodes.plot: To search for more clues about Mage's whereabouts, Derrida and Vidaux infiltrate Rebuild, the creator of the out-of-control androids. But to do so, they'll first need to navigate the underground tunnels and gain access to the city.

episodes.title: That Which Is Not Wholly Abandoned
episodes.plot: The group traces Mage's steps to a museum in the city of Vanfort. Derrida is struck by memories of visiting this place with his father when he was a child, and the strong memory spurs a sudden leap back to the past.

episodes.title: Those Who Search, Those Who Conceal
episodes.plot: Damages to Graham from repeated battles have taken their toll. While Vidaux walks to the city for repairs, Derrida and Yuri spend the night in an abandoned home, where Derrida begins experimenting with the mysterious "time ride" phenomenon.

episodes.title: The Loves of Each
episodes.plot: Derrida and Vidaux come to a new town looking for Yuri. But it turns out her kidnappers are from the government, and the conspiracy goes even deeper than expected.

episodes.title: The Fate of Time
episodes.plot: A trap set by Donna ends up leading the group to the man they're searching for. Can Derrida use time rides to save them all from their merciless pursuer?

episodes.title: Strong Bonds
episodes.plot: Vidaux's past with Mayuka is explored as the team makes a brutal charge through a DZ graveyard.

episodes.title: Those Who Have Let Go
episodes.plot: Five years after Derrida's tragedy, a reckless experiment gives birth to the entity known as Donna.

episodes.title: A Quiet Place
episodes.plot: Derrida and his friends make a final desperate run to the telescope facility where they believe Mage to be.
